mema samuluwedi sinhala saha demala bhashawen kathakala manoganeshan me bawa prakasha kara atha. demala jathika janatha peramuna chandaya warjanaya karana men kala illima ma pilinogaththath, ema pakshaye demala jathikathwaya pilibanda sthawaraya ma therum gaththemi.
